title: Olivia Munn shows some leg in short shorts as she posts sweet photo of herself and dog Frankie
text:
Olivia Munn has long been an outspoken advocate for adopting pets, as she's even the face of the Shelter Pet Project.

Her own beautiful pup Frankie is a shining example of her commitment to the animal-friendly cause.

She took to Instagram Sunday with an adorable snap of herself snuggling up to the cute canine.

Puppy love: Olivia Munn took to Instagram Sunday with an adorable snap of herself snuggling up to her adorable dog Frankie

The 39-year-old went in to kiss the sweet little dog, who was sound asleep on the top of the couch.

Munn captioned the adorable photo of herself and Frankie: 'All the feels.'

She showed off her gorgeous legs in some denim short shorts as she curled up on her couch.

She wore the shorts over a red one-piece swimsuit after spending a day in the sun with friends.

Serving body: She wore some denim short shorts over a red one-piece swimsuit after spending a day in the sun with friends

Pool pup: The Predator star was celebrating a friend's birthday with the pup and a leisurely day by the pool

The Predator star was celebrating a friend's birthday with the pup and a leisurely day by the pool.

She tagged the dog's personal Instagram account, which has amassed almost 28,000 followers since she adopted him in 2016.

Munn frequently posts some adorable photos of herself with Frankie on the popular account.

The Newsroom actress also tagged the Shelter Pet Project, which aims to place shelter pets with new families.

She's served as the face of the organization, recently posting some snaps with a paralyzed dog named Scooty to help her find a home.
